scripts.start: npm run start-backend && npm run start-frontend
scripts.start-frontend: npm install --prefix rejuicenate/frontend && npm run start --prefix rejuicenate/frontend
scripts.start-backend: npm install --prefix rejuicenate/backend && npm start --prefix rejuicenate/backend
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix rejuicenate/frontend && npm run build --prefix rejuicenate/frontend
